programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh is approached by the wife of a man eager to turn himself in, provided Josh split the bounty with his wife

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: A man with unwavering faith in a legend about lost treasure hires Josh to lead his family on an expedition.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: When a runaway is framed for killing a Pinkerton agent, Randall turns detective to uncover the real killer.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh is requested to meet a famous singer in Denver who has a job for him.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh comes to the aid of an old friend who is being strong-armed into selling the Outrider Hotel and Saloon.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh goes into the Apache camp to win the hand of a woman the Indians kidnapped as a child.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Pursuing killer Joe Collins, Josh is followed by a man who believes Collins could be his lost son.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: A religious cult cast lots and it falls upon a young woman to act as its angel of vengeance.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: A young orphan girl wants Josh to find the parents she insists are still alive.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: A father hires Josh to retrieve his son, an ideologue being used by plunderers to recruit freedom fighters.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh's browbeating about ending a decades-long feud gets him drafted to reconcile the hate-fueled hillbillies.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: To track down a cheating gambler and recover his money, Randall befriends the card sharp's stepson.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh pleads with the parents of a boy with appendicitis to let the doctor operate.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh tries to find a beautiful bride for his bashful buddy Charlie, the homeliest man in the West.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Randall portrays a prisoner in order to trick his cellmate into leading authorities to the $50,000 he stole.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Randall rescues Jake Pringle and learns he's not the only one with an interest in keeping the killer alive.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Rogue City celebrates Randall for bringing in killer Jumbo Kane, but turns on Josh when Kane breaks loose.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Randall is rooked out of his bounty by crafty criminal Hunt Willis and his accomplice.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: After losing a quick draw contest, Josh serves as guide for a dandified East Coast gun salesman.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: On the trail of a Cavalry deserter, Josh rides into a town ruled as a fiefdom of its psychopathic marshal.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Hired by a father to bring back the man who killed his son, Josh is surprised when he doesn't get paid.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh must bring a man back for murder. He has to outwit men bent on claiming the bounty.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh brings a wanted man in to the Mesa City Sheriff, only to find he killed the sheriff's brother.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh looks for a man bitten by a rabid dog. He learns the law wanted him to lead them to his outlaw brother.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: A man shoots his brother over property and blames it on an Indian who reclaimed his horse the man stole.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh is captured and forced to work on a chain gang in a gold mine.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Randall is tracking an escape artist who distracts a town, letting three guys rob the bank.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh signs on to help an amnesiac discover his identity.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: After her father is murdered, a daughter wants immediate justice rather than wait for the wheels of justice.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh is determined to debunk the menace posed by a marauding monster that has smashed mining camps.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh hires out for $100/day to find a woman who may be dead.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh brings in "Doc" Phillips hoping he can lure Clell Fanning out as he has an old score to settle with Clell

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh is arrested on a bogus horse-stealing charge.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: To net a $1000 reward, Josh saves Tolliver Bender from a hanging so he can testify in a trial.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: A woman hires Josh to clear her father on a false murder charge in a town that is not very welcoming.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh is hired to chase a killer by his brother, who is about to hang for a crime his brother committed.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh and Jason are on the trail of a karate expert accused of killing his employer.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Randall learns "hate comes high" in a town who have hired killers to murder their fellow resident.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh captures a wanted recruit and returns him to the Army, but the Captain refuses to pay.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh and Jason track a fugitive in Texas wanted for murder in Arizona, but his wife claims he is innocent.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: A dying man offers Josh $2000 to find his son, who ran away 15 years ago.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh and Jason are escorting prisoners to Leavenworth prison when a stranger begins following along behind.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh is summoned for help when the Pinto bank is robbed.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh expects a bounty for bringing in Daniel Trenner but his prisoner is stolen by the sheriff. Ex-army personnel want to stage an illegal trial accusing their former lieutenant of dereliction of duty

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh is hired by a woman to sober up Harry, a drunk who is also Josh's friend. She learned his wealthy brother who Harry hasn't seen in years is coming to visit so she wants Harry to be presentable.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh and the beautiful prisoner he is transporting are on a three day trip while her partner is still on the loose. For once Josh may not follow through on obeying the law as they fall in love.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh is on his way to River City to transport three convicts there to be hanged. The dangerous prisoners escape and appoint themselves the law, after the town is hit by a tornado, killing the sheriff.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: A journalist accompanies Josh on his manhunt to get an exclusive story on a bounty hunter. Josh agrees to let him join him in the hunt for Jack Torrance but finds they have different methods.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh feels compelled to repay a debt to an old friend who's in jail and may hang. However, the friend escapes, forcing Josh to go on the hunt for him until it appears he died when he went over a cliff

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh brings in outlaw Carlos Domingo, but he has to be released when the witness against him is killed. Josh concocts a surprise witness to testify against the notorious killer - his own mother.
